sentences.en: A painter and decorator was painting the walls of the house.
sentences.cn: 一位油漆工兼装璜工正在粉刷房子的墙壁.

sentences.en: A painter decorator was painting the wall of the house.
sentences.cn: —位油漆工兼装璜工正在粉刷房子的墙壁.

sentences.en: AKVIS Decorator lets you change the surface of the object.
sentences.cn: AKVIS装饰让你改变表面的对象.

sentences.en: An interior decorator designs and decorates the interior of a room or building.
sentences.cn: 室内装饰家设计,装饰房间或建筑物的内部.

sentences.en: Decorator provide a flexible alternative to subclass for extending functionality.
sentences.cn: 装饰模式提供了除子类继承外可供选择的另一种方案.

sentences.en: He now works as a painter and decorator.
He works as a painter and decorator.
sentences.cn: 他的职业是油漆匠和装潢师傅。

sentences.en: I have fixed up for the decorator to come on Monday.
sentences.cn: 我已安排好让装饰师星期一来.

sentences.en: Moira looked around and sniffed. "This place badly needs a decorator."
sentences.cn: 莫伊拉环顾四周，抽了抽鼻子。“这个地方太需要有人来装修一下了。”

sentences.en: My father is a interior decorator, my mother is a waitress.
sentences.cn: 我的爸爸是装修, 妈妈是待应.

sentences.en: The decorator appointed the hotel with ultramodern furnishings.
sentences.cn: 这位装修工用极其现代化的陈设装饰这家旅馆.

sentences.en: The decorator had the wood paneling painted to imitate marble.
sentences.cn: 油漆工油漆了木质镶板来模仿大理石.

sentences.en: The Decorator Pattern provides an alternative to subclassing for extending behavior.
sentences.cn: 装饰者模式提供了一种继承子类来扩展行为的选择.

sentences.en: They gave the decorator a free hand in doing their apartment over.
sentences.cn: 他们给装修师全权来翻修他们的房子.

sentences.en: You just can't get over my decorator, can you?
sentences.cn: 你看不上我的室内设计, 对 吧 ?

words.tran_cn: 装饰，修饰（decorate的过去式和过去分词形式）

trans.tran_en: someone who paints houses and puts paper on the walls as their job
